content: crochet something truly meaningful for you and your child these soft squishy letter and number pillows are an ideal way to teach your child while sharing warm moments together whether you make the basics or family the lustre and sheen of these heartwarming pillows make them showpieces in any room made with love by you and caron simply soft yarn help your child learn through play when you crochet these soft and squishy letter and number pillows in caron simply soft materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 1 g 315 yds/288 m note any chosen letter or number requires 2 balls letter a pumpkin 39765 2 balls letter b royal blue 39767 2 balls letter c cool green 39770 2 balls number 1 purple 39781 2 balls number 2 gold 39782 2 balls number 3 fuchsia 39764 2 balls joy pillows harvest red 39763 6 balls family pillows pumpkin 39765 12 balls *additional materials * stuffing measurements approx 13 33 cm high
